title: permanently suspended
body: I just shared my account to my best friend, because he play better than me! A few day later, my account get  permanently suspended.Its ridiculous If shared account with friend will get  permanently suspended why not warning people before sign up? And I spend a lot of money on skin,now my account get  permanently suspended ,is that deceive cunsumers?

replies.body:
Sorry your account got banned, but you broke the rules. It specifically says in the terms of service that you are not allowed to share accounts, and if you break the terms of service your account will be banned.  You agree to these terms of service every single time you log in after a patch, as well as when you sign up. 

>C. Login Credentials.  In creating an Account, you will be required to select a unique username and password (collectively, “Login Credentials”), which you will use each time you access the Game.  You may not share your Account with anyone other than as expressly set forth herein, and you are entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Login Credentials and for any and all activities (including purchases and charges, as applicable) that are conducted through your Account.  Please notify Riot Games immediately if you become aware of any breach of security, including any loss, theft or unauthorized disclosure of your Login Credentials. 

Unfortunately you wont be getting your account back.
